title: Holiday Report, Urlaubsreport, Woruber Reiseleiter Nicht Sprechen Durfen 1971

sources.title: Holiday Report, Urlaubsreport, Woruber Reiseleiter Nicht Sprechen Durfen 1971
sources.description: So many titles for this one most of them mimicking the various German sex comedy titles. Resort Girls, Holiday Report, Swedish Love Games. What Tour Guides Can't Tell you. Normally this would imply multiple releases and a lot of copies out there.  Alas, this is the best I could find and there are no English subtitles available.  Still we have Sybil Danning, Astrid Frank, Elisabeth Volkmann and the venerable Ernst Hofbauer at the helm.
